attributes.action: Please do not use taxpayers money to fund West Ham's conversion of the olympic stadium
attributes.additional_details:
I would like the government to seriously re-consider plans of using tax-payers money to fund the conversion of the olympic stadium into West Ham's new football ground, especially during this time of national austerity.

If premiership football teams can afford to pay the premium salaries which footballers command then I am certain that they will be able to foot the bill for their new stadium.
